title: Harissa Butter Chicken with Preserved Lemon Couscous - Foodie Fuel
name: Harissa Butter Chicken with Preserved Lemon Couscous - Foodie Fuel
method: Melt butter and soften the onion over medium heat.
Add garlic and aromatics, stirring slowly.
Incorporate the spice paste or powdered mix.
Fold in tomatoes or coconut base and bring to a gentle simmer.
Add protein or legumes and cook until fully tender.
Finish with yoghurt, tahini, lemon, or herbs depending on style.
Finish with chopped dill.

title: Tamarind & Ginger Beef with Charred Spring Greens - Foodie Fuel
name: Tamarind & Ginger Beef with Charred Spring Greens - Foodie Fuel
ingredients: 2 tbsp yoghurt or coconut milk (depending on dish)
method: Heat oil in a wide pan and sauté the onion until translucent.
Add garlic and ginger, cooking for one minute until fragrant.
Stir in the spice blend and toast lightly to release aromas.
Add the protein and brown on all sides.
Pour in stock and simmer gently until reduced and rich.
Adjust seasoning and finish with herbs or citrus.
Finish with chopped coriander.

method: Heat oil in a wide pan and sauté the onion until translucent.
Add garlic and ginger, cooking for one minute until fragrant.
Stir in the spice blend and toast lightly to release aromas.
Add the protein and brown on all sides.
Pour in stock and simmer gently until reduced and rich.
Adjust seasoning and finish with herbs or citrus.
Finish with chopped dill.

name: Paprika Coriander Chicken Traybake - Foodie Fuel
method: Melt butter and soften the onion over medium heat.
Add garlic and aromatics, stirring slowly.
Incorporate the spice paste or powdered mix.
Fold in tomatoes or coconut base and bring to a gentle simmer.
Add protein or legumes and cook until fully tender.
Finish with yoghurt, tahini, lemon, or herbs depending on style.
